Markdown rendering with caching and template application Handles date extraction, HTML caching, link processing, and page generation. See blg for template override instructions.

Imports

md, types, datetime, dynload

Vars

helperLib: TemplateLib
Set by blg.nim to enable template overrides

    tags: [TimeEffect], forbids: [].}
Parse date from first line; returns (Time, hasTime) or none.
